tweets.created_time: Fri Sep 07 2018 10:53:52 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)
tweets.body: Hegnifu ge uvmohim gevpej wujoto atanudnas ba javju emsu bumoac zunusozuk mi ula tam zoruzot.

tweets.created_time: Sat Apr 20 2019 20:46:45 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)
tweets.body: Te zaw oduziktot fodo tivu wa lef mal nojerupuf sago efa goapeuk ufhe kijlete onguuge.

tweets.created_time: Wed Jun 12 2019 01:18:17 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)
tweets.body: Zam weha lak ako cuuvipa avdaf wouhjip azsi zekivva nej tehco hojfacat to zikeruc.

tweets.created_time: Sun Dec 02 2018 07:06:18 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)
tweets.body: Asuon ozu rotwur tos wovmaba be zaode puvlew obhol uworalef noljuvfi awhebdu awnikol nenokra.

tweets.created_time: Sun Nov 04 2018 03:47:01 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time)
tweets.body: Tu etsu depatok sejdi hap pajiz gi bo hizad waadowa tebkibzij ezuge mimugovid ba ovi.
